list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having or showing behavior that is respectful and considerate of other people.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they thought she was wrong but were too polite to say so
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ nghĩ rằng cô ấy đã sai nhưng quá lịch sự để nói như vậy
